metadata.Title: CVE-2018-15879 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2019-6978. Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2019-6978. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2019-6978 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-15879` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.2.5-4ubuntu0.2
libgd3 - 2.2.5-4ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> php uses the system libgd2 looks like this is a dupe of CVE-2018-1000222

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.5-4ubuntu0.2').
